scripts.postinstall: webpack && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "mobile/www" && npm run cordova -- prepare && copyfiles -u 1 "mobile/xwalk-command-line" "mobile/platforms/android/assets/" && npm run nw install 0.21.1
scripts.dev:browser: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server -- -v -b" "webpack --watch"
scripts.dev:android: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server -- -v" "webpack --watch" "npm run cordova -- run android"
scripts.dev:desktop: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server -- -v" "webpack --watch"  "npm run nw ."
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build && npm run nw .
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npm run cordova -- build android --release
